page.title: 01INTRODUCTION.
page.content:
The area being studied is a picturesque{rural area}to the south of Bridgnorth in Shropshire. The rolling, green fields are broken up by small hamlets and communities.
The{population}is small, and most of their lives revolve around the rural community, but they are aware too of the changes taking place in the locality and the country at large.
The{survey}has been undertaken by 24 children aged 10-11 years at the Down County Primary School, which is within the 12 square kilometres surveyed. The children were assisted by Mr. M. Vincent, their Headteacher.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * *
